title: Stanley Cup Final Tied For Now, As Cavs Lead NBA Finals
teaser: The Chicago Blackhawks beat the Tampa Bay Lightning in Game 4 last night. The Cavaliers and Golden State Warriors play Game 4 tonight.
contentencoded:
The Stanley Cup Final between the Chicago Blackhawks and the Tampa Bay Lightning is tied at two wins apiece, after the Blackhawks edged the Lightning 2-1 in Game 4 last night.

In the NBA Finals, the Cleveland Cavaliers and Golden State Warriors play Game 4 tonight in Cleveland. The Cavs lead that series 2-1.

Host Robin Young checks in with Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
